title: Ipl 2025 auction x ISA-2
content: Let's approach the management to postpone the ISA atleast one day to enjoy the IPL auction , cannot concentrate on both at the same time 😬

comments.body: Which ISA 2 are you talking about? For first years, ISA 2 will be in January but the auction is tomorrow.
Sir u forgot 2nd and 3rd yrs uh💀
wow yeah let's all write to the management guys. I'm sure they'll listen to us
He didn't mention which year so I got confused since our ISAs got over like yesterday. Also silly me thought it would be called ISA 4 or ISA 6 for the seniors 😂🤦🏻

Loll. 

Also, don't give management any ideas about conducting 6 ISAs, bro. Been through enough lately 🥲🙏🏼🫂

F management,let's summon the Daddy

u/doredaddy
Approach the IPL management to postpone the auctions instead
fuck isa i have my knee surgery on Monday 😏
There is more chances of the auction getting postponed than Pes postponing their isa
Bro really thought it's like ipl seasons 😭
Well then guess I'm RCB because I don't win😭
This will work but you can't get the pes management to change anything
Doredaddy would postpone the IPL auction instead. He's more powerful than jay shah.
oh that feeling when knee surgery is tmr.....
